title: Conspiracy
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B007XZ121GWhen you’re an outlaw hoping for a pardon, and the emperor personally sends a note requesting that your team kidnap him, you make plans to comply…Even if it’ll involve infiltrating a train full of soldiers, bodyguards, and spies loyal to a nefarious business coalition that has numerous reasons to hate you.Even if it means leaving the city right after you’ve uncovered a secret weapons shipment that might be meant to start a war.Even if it's a trap...
author: Lindsay Buroker
